title: Pentel Hi-Polymer Eraser, White Erasers, Assorted Sizes, 6/Pack (ZEH2510BP)
highlights: Hi quality LATEX-FREE eraser removes lead easily and cleanly with very little pressure

description.header: Hi-Polymer erasers are the most popular erasers around because they not only erase cleanly, but they will not tear paper.
description.paragraph: Pentel® Hi-Polymer® Eraser in assorted sizes helps to clear pencil marks in corners and cap fits into wooden case pencils. Latex-free eraser is made of high quality material and is sold as 6 per pack.
bullets: Hi quality LATEX-FREE eraser removes lead easily and cleanly with very little pressure
Includes 4 x white cap eraser, 1 x small block eraser, 1 x large block eraser
Our best selling Hi-Polymer® eraser now in a pencil cap size; fits on most wood case pencils
Doesn't crack or harden with age; remains soft and ready to use
No smudges, no paper tears and no ghosting
Block style is perfect for getting into little corners or erasing large areas quickly
